offers.title: Offers
offers.description: Versatile reward options to suit your preferences.

defaultBanners.title: A world of rewards awaits
defaultBanners.subtitle: Earning loyalty points has never been more rewarding. Redeem them for exclusive vacation packages and travel the world in style.

defaultBanners.title: Rewarding Your Lifestyle Choices
defaultBanners.subtitle: Whether you love to travel, dine out, shop, or invest, our portal offers rewards that align with your interests.

defaultBanners.title: Sustainability Meets Savings
defaultBanners.subtitle: Make a positive impact on the environment while enjoying cashback, gift cards, and more.

moneyBanners.title: Reward made awesome
moneyBanners.subtitle: Earn points faster than ever and use them to turn dreams into exciting adventures.

carouselBanners.title: Time's running out: set up a salary deposit and snag 5,000 points
carouselBanners.subtitle: We noticed you aren't receiving a recurring salary deposit into your primary account. Set one up by Dec 15, '23 and boost your rewards balance with 5,000 points.

carouselBanners.title: 30% bonus for transfers to Flying Blue
carouselBanners.subtitle: Transfer points to Flying Blue by Nov 30, 2023 and enjoy a 30% bonus on top of the usual 1:1 conversion ratio.

carouselBanners.title: High-yield savings made even more rewarding
carouselBanners.subtitle: Transfer funds into your high-yield savings account to enjoy 5% interest plus earn 1 point per $1 deposited.

quicklinkTiles.title: Transfer to British Airways Executive Club

footerParagraph: At Ascenda, we're your passport to unforgettable journeys and dream vacations. Our rewards program is designed to elevate your travel experience, whether you're accumulating miles, redeeming gift cards, or enjoying the perks of frequent traveler programs. With card-linked offers, we bring the world to your fingertips, one step closer to your dream destination. We're committed to turning your travel aspirations into reality, so join us today and let's embark on an incredible adventure together.

As avid travelers ourselves, we understand the anticipation and excitement that comes with planning your next escape. That's why we're dedicated to providing you with a seamless and rewarding booking experience. Our team of experts curates exclusive deals, insider tips, and travel inspiration to ensure your journey is not just memorable, but extraordinary. So, whether you're exploring new cultures, seeking relaxation on a pristine beach, or venturing into the unknown, trust us to be your trusted companion on the road to discovery. Bon voyage!
